questions.question: Bed of particles can be fluidized with gases?

answers.a: frictional force = force of gravity on the particles - Buoyancy force
answers.b: frictional force > force of gravity on the particles - Buoyancy force

questions.question: A sphere settles freely through a pool of liquid and the settling is in stokesâ€™ law range. The terminal velocity of the sphere will

answers.a: be independent of the liquid viscosity
answers.d: decrease inversely with the square of viscosity

questions.question: A bed constists of particles of density 2000 kg/m3.  If the height of the bed is 1.5 m and its porosity 0.4, the pressure drop required to fluidize the bed is
Sphericity for a spherical particle is
